item.title: Testing Out Hugo
item.description: This is the very first article on this blog. I decided to give Hugo a try and so far I am honestly impressed by the simplicity of it. The performance is fantastic as GitHub Pages is managing the hosting for this static website. Thinking about setting up a domain name at some point, but for now .github.io is decent for an occasional writer. The setup was pretty straightforward, as I followed the getting started guide, found a great theme (PaperMod) and used the Github actions workflow found here.
